o000_door.name: door
o000_door.lookDescription: A locked and sturdy door is blocking the way east. There's a keyhole on it.

messages.blockedText: A door blocks the way here. There's a keyhole on it.
messages.unblockedText: The door is unlocked, this way is open now!

o001_bats.name: bats
o001_bats.lookDescription: A group of bats hanging from the cieling. They're very scary.

messages.blockedText: The bats attack anyone that tries to pass through. Maybe fire can scare them away...
messages.unblockedText: Terrified of the fire, the bats flew away from the entrance!

o002_boulder.name: boulder
o002_boulder.lookDescription: A boulder is in the way of the entrance to the other room.

messages.blockedText: A boulder is blocking that way, but a strong person can push it out of the way.
messages.unblockedText: The boulder rolled out of the way, this entrance is open now!

o003_gate.name: gate
o003_gate.lookDescription: A magnificent gate covered in gems blocks the way. It seems like one's missing though. Maybe that's a clue on how to unlock the gate...

messages.blockedText: A magnificent gate covered in gems blocks the way. It seems like one's missing though.
messages.unblockedText: The gate is unlocked, this way is open now!

o004_hole.name: hole
o004_hole.lookDescription: A tiny hole. Someone small can enter it.

messages.blockedText: It's blocked. Besides where you came from, there's also a hole a small person can enter.
messages.unblockedText: You squeeze through the hole, and hit a button on the other side that opens the blocked entrance!

o005_arrows.name: arrows
o005_arrows.lookDescription: A volley of arrows blocks the way past.

messages.blockedText: A volley of arrows blocks the way past.
messages.unblockedText: The shield blocks the volley the arrows! You hit a button on the other side of the room and the arrows stop flying.

o006_chasm.name: chasm
o006_chasm.lookDescription: A deep chasm with a powerful updraft lies in front of you. There might be an item around to help you glide across.

messages.blockedText: An updraft pushes you back. Maybe you can use an item to glide across this chasm.
messages.unblockedText: Pix uses the flag like a glider to cross the chasm but doesn't have enough forward momentum, they're gonna fall!
Marine threw the trident at the Eye Statue, a loud clang echoed in the room.

o008_alfredo.name: Alfredo
o008_alfredo.lookDescription: A very round, very cute cat!

messages.blockedText: The cat meows at you. He looks hungry and annoyed.
messages.unblockedText: Alfredo gobbles up the fish! He rubs up against Pix's leg then slinks away from the door to some hidden corner of the house.
